summary: Completed testing of new Bulk Upload module and Auto Medicine Calculation features for ABC Program Management System. All 29 backend tests pass (100%). Frontend Bulk Upload page loads correctly with both Catching and Surgery tabs. Surgery form displays auto-calculated medicine dosages section.
critical_code_review_comments: Bulk Upload module well-implemented with proper Excel template generation and parsing
Medicine protocol correctly implements weight-based dosage calculation with special rules (fixed doses, per_10kg, max limits, rounding)
Female-only medicines (Vicryl 2) correctly excluded for male animals
Cancelled surgeries correctly skip medicine deduction
Weight validation (10-30 kg) properly enforced on both frontend and backend
seed_data_creation: Created test cases via bulk upload: TEST-BULK-101, TEST-BULK-102, TEST-BULK-103 with surgery records
context_for_next_testing_agent: Bulk Upload and Auto Medicine Calculation features fully tested. Test cases created with TEST-BULK-* and TEST-PYTEST-* prefixes. Medicine stock has been deducted from test surgeries - some medicines show negative stock (Ketamine, Intacef Tazo, Tincture, Metronidazole) which is expected from test data.

features_tested.catching_tab: PASS - Catching Records tab visible and functional
features_tested.surgery_tab: PASS - Surgery Records tab visible and functional
features_tested.upload_surgery_records: PASS - /api/bulk-upload/surgery creates surgery records with auto medicine deduction
features_tested.calculate_medicines_endpoint: PASS - /api/calculate-medicines returns correct dosages for weight/gender
features_tested.weight_validation: PASS - Weight outside 10-30 kg range rejected with 400 error
features_tested.female_only_medicines: PASS - Vicryl 2 only calculated for female animals
features_tested.cancelled_surgery_no_deduction: PASS - Cancelled surgeries don't deduct medicine stock
features_tested.surgery_form_page: PASS - /surgery displays auto-calculated medicine dosages section
features_tested.navigation_bulk_upload: PASS - Bulk Upload nav item visible for Super User role
